name: Bacon, Sports & Beer Celebration T-Shirt
description:
Bacon, Sports and Beer are the hat trick of awesomeness. This is the first ever t-shirt that we created for the Celebration that blew the roof off of Union Station.

We believe in quality so these shirts are made of that super soft material, not that weak sauce stuff you get with beer league softball t-shirts.

name: YES AND T-SHIRT
description:
Comedy is a big part of what we do at Bacon Sports. Some of us graduated from the Second City improv program in Chicago, some of us are standup comedians. We all know that the two biggest words in comedy are “YES AND”. Combing our love of music and nostalgia we took this simple phrase and fused it together with the iconic RUN DMC logo to create what is most definitely the coolest comedy shirt you’ll ever see. The cost is $15 and you can buy this via Paypal below.

We believe in quality so these shirts are made of that super soft material, not that weak sauce stuff you get with beer league softball t-shirts.

name: HELLO FRIENDS T-SHIRT
description:
This Hello Friends t-shirt was inspired by sports greatest golf tournament and Jim Nantz’s famous “Hello Friends” catch phrase. This design combines the two to give you the dopest golf themed t-shirt ever. This is a must have for any sports fan that loves that Augusta, Rae’s Creek, Amen Corner, Jim Nantz or golf in general. The cost is $20 and you can buy this via Paypal below.

We believe in quality so these shirts are made of that super soft material, not that weak sauce stuff you get with beer league softball t-shirts.

name: CANADIAN BACON PUNTS ON 3RD DOWN KOOZIE
description: Nothing keeps your beer colder and make it look sweeter than our Bacon Sports Canadian bacon punts on 3rd down koozie. Get two of them for only $5.

name: Bacon Sports Tecmo Bowl T-Shirt
description:
We took our love of the greatest Nintendo football game ever, Tecmo Bowl, to create our first original Bacon Sports t-shirt. We spent countless hours making Bo Jackson run circles around opposing defenses so we could think of no better design that represented our brand like this one. The cost is $15 and you can buy this via Paypal below.

We believe in quality so these shirts are made of that super soft material, not that weak sauce stuff you get with beer league softball t-shirts.
